node.title: Hollywood's Unhealthy Obsession With Movie Ratings Needs to End
node.custom_excerpt: From a sanitised Die Hard sequel to an R-rated Star Trek, when it comes to ratings Hollywood is incapable of leaving well enough alone.
node.excerpt: From a sanitised Die Hard sequel to an R-rated Star Trek, when it comes to ratings Hollywood is incapable of leaving well enough alone.

node.title: Review | For the Love of the Boogeyman: 40 Years of Halloween
node.custom_excerpt: Although it clearly comes from a place of love, For the Love of the Boogeyman is a shallow documentary that has little new to offer.
